pullRequest.title: [567469] Transition of referenced Scenarios
pullRequest.bodyText:
transition also the referenced scenarios
add validation rule + QF if the referenced scenarios are not valid
add preferences menu to initialize the scenario (default is false)
doc
junits for DWF_DS_23

Change-Id: I0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
Signed-off-by: Georgiana Ecobici georgiana-elena.ecobici@thalesgroup.com
